news.title: Tankers showing caution around Straight of Hormuz after U.S. attack on Iran nuclear sites
news.summary: A notable event occurred between early Sunday and early Monday, when at least six vessels diverted their courses. At least one ship was carrying more than 1,000 people.

news.title: Major U.S. health insurers say they will streamline controversial process for approving care
news.summary: Insurers such as CVS and UnitedHealthcare will implement the changes across commercial, Medicare and Medicaid plans. The changes will benefit 257 million Americans.

news.title: Trump Media approves $400 million stock buyback
news.summary: President Donald Trump indirectly owns more than 114 million shares of the company through a revocable trust. Trump is the largest shareholder of The Trump Organization.

news.title: Novo Nordisk ends deal with Hims & Hers over sales of Wegovy copycats; HIMS drops 20%
news.summary: Novo Nordisk says Hims & Hers has "failed to adhere to the law which prohibits mass sales of compounded drugs" under the "false guise" of personalization.

news.title: Vultr raises over $300 million in debt as Wall Street goes bigger in cloud infrastructure
news.summary: Vultr is trying to build more capacity to handle traditional applications as well as artificial intelligence models. Vultr wants to be able to handle both traditional and artificial intelligence applications.

news.title: How Trump’s Iran strike just made your stock portfolio great again
news.summary: Take a close look now at U.S. manufacturers, semiconductor producers, agricultural exporters, cybersecurity firms and defense contractors. Take a closeLook now at. U.N. Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon's speech to the United Nations.

news.title: ‘I’m 49 and have no debt except for a mortgage’: Should I take a $61,000 lump sum or $355 a month for life?
news.summary: “My S&P 500 investments have roughly doubled every seven years,” he says. “I’m a big believer in long-term investing.”

news.title: The U.S. bull market is intact — and a key signal is coming from Tel Aviv, says this strategist
news.summary: Tel Aviv stock market at record highs suggests investors are looking through the current crisis. Tel Aviv stock Market at Record High suggests Investors are Looking Through the Current Crisis.

news.title: ‘Is this normal?’ I’m 40 and inherited an IRA worth $650K. It has grown to $1M over five years. But I had a pro look at my investments and one-third are underperforming.
news.summary: . Have an issue with your financial planner or looking for a new one? Email questions or concerns to picks@marketwatch.com.

news.title: These are the reasons to stay positive on stocks, according to Morgan Stanley
news.summary: Morgan Stanley interpret  current geopolitical turbulence as a chance to buy stocks. Morgan Stanley: 'We see this as a good time to buy shares in the U.S.'
